snippet.title: ARMS REMIX: Remixed Stages Pack - Version 3.0 Trailer
snippet.description:
Get the mod here: https://gamebanana.com/mods/389192

The Remixed Stages Pack version 3.0 is out now! This version adds the final stage, now every single stage has a brand new look! and with that...

ARMS REMIX is finally complete!

Tired of the same old look on your arenas? ARMS REMIX has you covered! This mod will give most stages in ARMS a brand new look by changing their time of day! This trailer is a small preview to what you can expect! The mod can be used completely by itself in the original game, or alongside ARMS REMIX for the maximum Remixed experience!

#ARMS #ARMSREMIX
